name: Solar Dawn
description:
Solar Dawn Description

Educational Physics Video Game. Build as part of Stavros Barousis' Diploma Thesis at University of Patras, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering.

Supervising Professor: Nikolaos Avouris

WebGL Embedded Player Information 

  • Some of the features of the desktop version are disabled on WebGL version, in order to ensure stability and good performance on all browsers.
  • Play game in fullscreen and enable audio to have the full experience!
